instructions.title: Instructions
instructions.upload: Upload a CSV file to import tasks.
instructions.format: The file must contain exactly two columns in this order: Task Title and Description.
instructions.header: The first row should be the header row and will be skipped.

upload.title: Click or drag CSV file to this area to upload
upload.hint: Only CSV files are supported. Maximum file size is 5MB.

validation.tooLarge: File size must be less than 5MB

errors.importFailedDesc: Failed to import CSV file. Please try again.
errors.noFileDesc: Please select a CSV file to upload.
errors.processingFailed: Failed to process the CSV file.

success.imported: Import complete. {{count}} tasks were created successfully.
success.importedWithSkipped: Import complete. {{tasksCreated}} tasks were created. {{rowsSkipped}} rows were skipped due to missing title.
success.processed: Successfully processed {{processed}} tasks out of {{total}} total.
